amendment.description: To require the advice and consent of the Senate or an Act of Congress to suspend, terminate, or withdraw the United States from the North Atlantic Treaty and authorizing related litigation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 429 under the order of 7/19/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 28. Record Vote Number: 190.

Amendment SA 429 proposed by Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3136-3137) To require the advice and consent of the Senate or an Act of Congress to suspend, terminate, or withdraw the United States from the North Atlantic Treaty and authorizing related litigation, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 429 proposed by Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 429 under the order of 7/19/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 28. Record Vote Number: 190.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 429 under the order of 7/19/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 28. Record Vote Number: 190.
